resources.string:
%1$s is a free and open source app. If you want to support development, donating using my %4$s wallet is the best way to do that.

Why %4$s? %4$s is decentralized digital currency that enables instant payments to anyone, anywhere in the world without any restrictions.

Copyright 2013-2014 Artem Chepurnoy. All Rights Reserved.

Many thanks to those open source tools: HoloCircularProgressBar, Android Support Library, Apache Commons and to all who helped with translations.
